SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N' ORDER BY P.CREATE_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 16
